item.title: Publications
item.description: For a full list of publications, please visit my Google Scholar. Book Chapters, Survey and Library Video Unsupervised Domain Adaptation with Deep Learning: A Comprehensive Survey Yuecong Xu, Haozhi Cao, Zhenghua Chen, Xiaoli Li, Lihua Xie, Jianfei Yang* In ACM Computing Surveys (IF=23.6), 2024 SenseFi: A Library and Benchmark on Deep-Learning-Empowered WiFi Human Sensing Jianfei Yang, Xinyan Chen, Dazhuo Wang, Han Zou, Chris Xiaoxuan Lu, Sumei Sun, Lihua Xie In Patterns, Cell Press, 2023
